pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet inv decrease invisible decrease back loop tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - any colour - yarn needle - stitch marker - scissors - safety eyes - stuffing final size - the length is 11 cm and the height is 6 cm technical notes *the body is worked in spirals so use a stitch marker to indicate the start of a round *finish all pieces before attaching them together *make sure you stuff the body *insert the eyes before you close the body *at the end of each round/row is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern body any colour round 1 make a magic_ring into the magic_ring make 4 single_crochet 4 sts round 2 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 6 sts round 3 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 9 sts round 4 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat around 12 sts round 5 make 2 single_crochet in the first st followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 18 sts round 6-11 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 18 sts round 12 make 1 single_crochet inv decrease followed by 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around 12 sts round 13 make 6 single_crochet inv decrease 6 sts *insert the eyes stuff and close shut top fin any colour row 1 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch and 1 slip_stitch 5 sts fasten_off and cut the starting weave it in the fin then sew to the leave a 10 cm yarn yarn tail short to hide it top tail to sew the fin to the top tail any colour row 1 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 single_crochet in each chain across 5 sts row 2-5 chain 1 turn make 1 single_crochet in the back loop of each st across 5 sts fasten_off and weave the yarn pull fip over weave leave a 10 cm yarn needle through the the yarn needle tail top of the folds through the top of the folds pull tie a knot sew to the back of the fish side
